branch of tree as rod, stick, used by Jacob in breeding his flocks, Ge 30:37 ([[לִבְנֶה לַח]] ´[[מ]]), v:Ge 30:37, v:Ge 30:38, v:Ge 30:39, v:Ge 30:41, v:Ge 30:41; of symbolic rod ([[שָׁקֵד]] ´[[מ]] almond-rod) in Jerem.'s vision Je 1:11; symbolic rods or staves, with names, used by proph. Zec 11:7, Zec 11:10, Zec 11:14; fig. of Moab [[תִּבְּאָרָה]] ´[[מ]] Je 48:17 (‖[[מַטֵּה־עׂז]]).

staff, used in journeying Ge 32:11, Ex 12:11, 1Sa 17:40 cf. v:1Sa 17:43; carried even when riding Nu 22:27; so also [[מַקֵּל יׇד]] Ez Eze 39:9 (= riding-stick) acc. to Hi Da Berthol; < a weapon ( + [[מָגֵּן]], [[חִנָּה]], [[קֶשֶׁת]], [[חִצִּים]], [[רׂמַח]].
